publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: A free-vvill offering, or, a Pillar of praise : with a thankfull remembrance for the receit of mercies, in a long voyage, and happy arrivall. First preached in Fen-Church, the 7 of September, 1634. now published by the author, Samuel Hinde
monogr.author: Hinde, Samuel

div.head: The Author to the Reader.
div.p: REader, in the perusall of the following leaves, thou shalt have some tryall both of thy patience and judgement. My absence from the Presse, with some delinquency of the transcriber, occasioned divers errours, which either thy judgement may rectifie, or thy patience dispence with. I endeavoured to purge it from some, which thou shalt finde amended in the closure of the booke. Let thy ayme be directed to the matter, not the words, 'twill bring God most honour, thy selfe most benefit.

closer.signed: Thy faithfull friend and Monitor, S. H.
